tasks.description: Herr Müller (senior colleague) showing Frau Weber (new employee) around a modern office. They are standing next to a desk with computer. Herr Müller is gesturing to show the workspace. Professional office environment.
tasks.context: Opening dialog where a new colleague is shown around the office

tasks.description: Modern office desk (Schreibtisch) with computer monitor, keyboard, mouse, desk lamp, organized documents, and coffee cup. Clean, professional setup by a window with natural light.
Office printer/copier machine in a hallway or shared office space. Person standing nearby using the printer, papers coming out of the machine.
tasks.context: Vocabulary: 'der Drucker' (Printer) - mentioned as being in the hallway

tasks.description: Business meeting (Besprechung) with 4-5 professionals sitting around a conference table. Laptop open, documents visible, people engaged in discussion. Professional conference room setting.
Modern conference room (Konferenzraum) with long table, multiple chairs, projection screen or large monitor on wall. Professional meeting space, could show glass walls typical of modern offices.
Close-up of laptop screen showing email inbox interface. Person typing an email, 'E-Mail' visible in subject line or folder. Professional workspace visible in background.
Professional looking frustrated at slow computer. Hand on forehead or looking concerned at screen showing loading icon or progress bar. Illustrates 'ein Problem mit dem Drucker/Computer'.
tasks.context: Vocabulary: 'das Problem' (Problem) - specifically technical issues at work

tasks.description: Herr Müller shows Frau Weber around the office. Herr Müller: 'Guten Morgen! Ich zeige Ihnen das Büro. Hier ist Ihr Schreibtisch.' Frau Weber: 'Danke schön! Wo ist der Drucker?' Herr Müller: 'Der Drucker ist im Flur. Kopieren Sie bitte diese Dokumente.' Frau Weber: 'In Ordnung. Wann beginnt die Besprechung?' Herr Müller: 'Um 10 Uhr im Konferenzraum.'
tasks.context: Office orientation dialog demonstrating formal imperative and office vocabulary

specs.audio: Clear German pronunciation, formal business tone with Sie-form

tasks.notes: Actors should use formal Sie-form throughout. Show them walking through office, pointing to desk and hallway. Professional business attire required.

summary.priority: Focus on office environment, equipment, and professional communication settings
